mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into projectfile (projectid, url, createtime, updatetime) values (#{projectid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, now(), now())
mapper.update: update projectfile set projectid = #{projectid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, url = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, updatetime = now() where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, projectid, url, createtime, updatetime from projectfile
